name: convex-tpcb
description: TPC-B benchmark for Convex using k6

scripts.test:quick: k6 run k6/tpcb-convex.js -e SCALE_FACTOR=1 -e CONNS=5 -e CONSECUTIVE_DURATION=30
scripts.test:medium: k6 run k6/tpcb-convex.js -e SCALE_FACTOR=10 -e CONNS=20 -e CONSECUTIVE_DURATION=300
scripts.test:full: k6 run k6/tpcb-convex.js -e SCALE_FACTOR=10 -e CONNS=50 -e CONSECUTIVE_DURATION=600
